title: Worry: I'm in big trouble now
creator_credit: Donald Connors, Guidance Association and Motion Media
brief_description: Designed to help young people understand and deal with their feelings and emotions. Presents the story of a boy whose neglect of this responsibilities leads to the disappearance of his younger brother. The viewer is left to decide what the boy will do and what he should do.
